author: andyc
msg: Separating out parser configuration information from the
XNI Core. The next steps will be to implement this change
in the Xerces2 parser and then remove the old files so
that XNI Core (org.apache.xerces.xni) only contains the
interfaces necessary to communicate the "streaming info
set". This separation of interfaces represents the first
standard extension package for XNI: parser configuration.
